mapper.select: SELECT COLUMN_NAME as columnName , COLUMN_COMMENT as columnComment , IS_NULLABLE as isNullable , COLUMN_KEY as columnKey , COLUMN_TYPE as columnType FROM information_schema.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = #{tableName} AND COLUMN_NAME != 'reg_date' AND COLUMN_NAME != 'upd_date' AND COLUMN_NAME != 'createdat' AND COLUMN_NAME != 'modifiedat'
SELECT city_code , city_name , super_code , except_code , naver_code , do_name , abbr_do_name , si_name , level FROM tb_city_code ORDER BY city_name asc
SELECT provider_id , provider_name , city_code_min , city_code_max FROM tb_bus_provider ORDER BY provider_name asc
